name: pseudonymously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
using a different name from your real name, especially on something you have written: Her short articles on famous artists were often written pseudonymously. He was caught pseudonymously praising himself on the magazine's website.
More examplesFewer examplesWhen the novel was pseudonymously published in 1954, it caused a sensation in the literary world of Paris. The things that you say while speaking pseudonymously will of course be characteristic of you.The author pseudonymously known as Flann O’Brien is a hero of modern Irish fiction.
